headline: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Just Revealed More Than a Billion Dollars in New Investments -- and This Steel-Manufacturer Is on the Short List
summary: Although the chosen company is traditional in many ways, it's well positioned to take advantage of present and future trends.
